titleStmt.title: The saints triumph over the last enemy in a sermon preached at the funeral of that zealous and painful Minister of Christ Mr. James Janeway : unto which is added his character, his sore conflict before he dyed, and afterwards his triumphant manner of departing from earth to the heavenly inheritance / by Nathanael Vincent.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Nathanael, 1639?-1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
